r.s: Provides an easy way to perform HTTP requests
r.d: Supports GET/POST/HEAD/TRACE/PUT/DELETE, Basic authentication, Proxy, Proxy Authentication, SSL, file uploads etc.
r.n: * Auth information is properly extracted from URLs of the form http://user:pass@host/ (bug #1507) * Connection to server is closed after performing request (bug #1692) * Use correct argument separator for generated query stings (bug #1857, see also bug #704 for Net_URL) * Do not use gzip encoding if certain string functions are overloaded by mbstring extension (bug #1781) * addPostData() now properly handles multidimensional arrays (bug #2233)
